sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SARRACONIA, in botany: A genus of the monogynia order, belonging to the polyandria claſs of plants; and in the natural method ranking under the 54th order, Miſcellaneae. The corolla is pentapetalous; the calyx is double, and triphyllous below; pentaphyllous above; the capſule quinquelocular; the ſtyle has a ſtigma of the form of a ſhield.
